title: The logotype that never was.
content:
This animation for the Razorfish Left (West) Coast extranet got killed. Bummer 'cuz I was liking it.
LEFT
left2.swf (1 k)
!-/attachment-!\>!-attachment:\>
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content:
The letters and the arrow are formed from   
perfect squares.

Nice.   
What about a morph from the LFT arrows to "L", "F" and "T"?
